issue.title: [Rust] Remove tuple on FixedSizeList datatype
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7521](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7521). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The FixedSizeList datatype takes a tuple of Box<DataType> and length, but this could be simplified to take the two values without a tuple.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7521?focusedCommentId=17011757) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6142
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6142>
